com.st.st25sdk.command

Class Iso15693Protocol

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.st.st25sdk.command.Iso15693Protocol
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Iso15693Command, Type5Command, Type5MemoryCommand, VicinityCommand, VicinityMemoryCommand

    public class Iso15693Protocol
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines methods for the high level methods for ISO15693 protocol

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static byte ADDRESSED_MODE
      Mask for request flag bit 6 in case of bit 3 = 0 : Address_flag (1: request sent to Addressed tag)
      static byte DEFAULT_FLAG 
      static int DEFAULT_READ_MULTIPLE_MAX_NBR_OF_BLOCKS
      Maximum number of block that can be read (M24LR specification)

      Maximum number of block that written with write multiple block commands

      Mask for request flag bit 5 in case of bit 3 = 0 : AFI_flag (0: AFI field is not present / 1: AFI field is present)

      Mask for request flag bit 5 in case of bit 3 = 0 : AFI_flag (0: AFI field is not present / 1: AFI field is present)

      Mask for request flag bit 3 : Inventory_flag (0: not inventory command / 1: inventory commands)
      static byte INVENTORY_ONE_SLOT
      Mask for request flag bit 6 in case of bit 3 = 0 : Nb_Slots_flag (0: 16 Slots / 1: 1 Slot)

      ISO15693 error code : BLOCK ALREADY LOACKED

      protected static int ISO15693_CUSTOM_ST_HEADER_SIZE_UID
      Size of frame containing flag (1byte) command (1byte) Mfg code (1 byte) uid (8 bytes) for ISO15693 Custom Commands

      Size of frame containing flag (1byte) command (1byte) uid (8 bytes)

      flag default value set (High data rate and addressed mode)
      protected int mNbrOfBytesPerBlock 
      protected RFReaderInterface mReaderInterface 
      protected byte[] mUid 
      static byte OPTION_FLAG
      Mask for request flag bit 7 in case of bit 3 = 0 : Option_flag (0: Option not activated / 1: Option activated)
      static byte PROTOCOL_FORMAT_EXTENSION
      Mask for request flag bit 4 : Protocol_Extension_flag (0: no protocol extension format / 1: RFU)
      static byte SELECTED_MODE
      Mask for request flag bit 5 in case of bit 3 = 0 : Select_flag (1: request sent to Selected tag)
      static byte STM_MANUFACTURER_CODE
      STMicroelectronics ISO15693 Custom command code
      static byte SUB_CARRIER_MODE
      Mask for request flag bit 1 : Subcarrier_flag (0 : One subcarrier / 1: Two subcarriers)
